comments:

You probably have you own starting script to start eclipse, and are not using
Eclipse.exe.
If you do, the options -Dosgi.checkConfiguration=true -Dosgi.clean=true should
be in there.

You can also delete the folder 'configuration' in your eclipse directory.

Please reopen if this is a different problem.
